Summary: my friends and i spot an orange ball above us
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There were no other sightings in Winnipeg on or around November 30th 1975
divs: Sighting DetailsI have finally decided to report an incident that has happened when i was 8 or 9years old.My friends and i5 of us in totalwere out bike riding through ourneighborhood and school yard when David noticed something above us.We allstopped and looked up,then seen this round orange ball about 12 a mile to a milehigh in the sky.Now,at the time,i never knew what a ufo was,we all just lookedat it and wondered what it was.We all decided to go to the nearest house welived atwhich was Davidsand tell the parents.It was about a 1 minute bike rideto his house and when we got there,he ran inside to get his mom and dad.Itseemed the object followed us from the school yard right to Davids house.Davidcame out of the house with his parents looking up to the sky.They couldn,tbelieve what they were seeing,we all stared up at it for a few minutes whenDavids mom asked Davids older brother to get the camera.He ran in the house ,gotthe camera,came back out and started taking pictures.As soon as the first clickof the camera sounded,the object started to move west of us at a high speed,sofast we got 3 pictures of it.Their next door neighbors was outside watching allthis with us and nobody could explain what has just happened.Davids mom phoned afew radio stations and they refered her to the local planetarium.To this day,i,ve never seen the pictures we took ,but then again ,i didnt need to afterwitnessing it with my own eyes.I look up in the sky everyday to hopefully seesomething like it again.I wish i could remember all of my friends names at thetime,but only Davids sticks out because he was a good friend then.
